StudentProfile.title: StudentProfile
StudentProfile.description: Represents a student user's profile information, excluding authentication credentials, which are handled externally.

id.description: Unique identifier for the StudentProfile entity. This is expected to align with the external authentication system's user ID.

firstName.description: The first name of the student.

lastName.description: The last name of the student.

email.description: The primary email address of the student.

contactNumber.description: The contact phone number of the student.

educationSummary.description: A summary of the student's educational background.

skills.description: A list of skills possessed by the student.

resumeUrl.description: A URL pointing to the student's resume.

portfolioUrl.description: An optional URL pointing to the student's professional portfolio.

preferredRoles.description: A list of job roles the student is interested in.

preferredLocations.description: A list of preferred job locations for the student.

isRemotePreferred.description: Indicates if the student prefers remote work opportunities.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the student profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the student profile was last updated.

EmployerProfile.title: EmployerProfile
EmployerProfile.description: Represents an employer's company profile information, excluding authentication credentials, which are handled externally.

id.description: Unique identifier for the EmployerProfile entity. This is expected to align with the external authentication system's user ID.

companyName.description: The legal name of the company.

companyWebsite.description: The official website URL of the company.

companyDescription.description: A brief description of the company and its activities.

contactPersonName.description: The name of the primary contact person for the company.

contactEmail.description: The primary email address for company communications.

contactNumber.description: The primary contact phone number for the company.

companyLocation.description: The main operational location of the company (e.g., city, state, country).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the employer profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the employer profile was last updated.

JobListing.title: JobListing
JobListing.description: Represents a job opportunity posted by an employer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the JobListing entity.

title.description: The title of the job position.

description.description: A detailed description of the job responsibilities and requirements.

location.description: The physical location of the job (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'Remote', 'Hybrid').

stipendMin.description: The minimum stipend or salary offered for the position. Optional.

stipendMax.description: The maximum stipend or salary offered for the position. Optional.

applicationDeadline.description: The deadline for submitting applications for this job.

remoteOption.description: Indicates if remote work is an option for this job.

skillsRequired.description: A list of skills required for this job position.

postedAt.description: Timestamp when the job listing was first posted.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the job listing was last updated.

status.description: The current status of the job listing (e.g., 'Active', 'Closed', 'Draft', 'Archived').

Application.title: Application
Application.description: Represents a student's application to a specific job listing.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Application entity.

applicationDate.description: Timestamp when the application was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the application (e.g., 'Applied', 'Under Review', 'Interview Scheduled', 'Offer Extended', 'Accepted', 'Rejected').

coverLetterText.description: The text content of the cover letter submitted with the application. Optional.

attachedResumeUrl.description: An optional URL pointing to a specific resume version attached to this application.

feedback.description: Optional feedback provided by the employer regarding the application.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the application status or details were last updated.
